name: Live My Journey
tag_list: travel, online-travel, travel-planning, social-travel, social, location-based
overview:
Live My Journey is your bookmark for the real world. Discover, save and recommend the places you love without the pain of ratings or writing reviews.

Easily Save What You Love

It’s super easy to save the places you love! Whether it was a little vintage clothes shop on your trip to Paris, your local neighborhood cafe or the Colosseum in Rome, you’ll always keep a record of those gems you’ve loved. It takes just seconds and we automatically map them for you and search the web for beautiful photos in case you don’t have any on hand.

Instantly Exchange Recommendations

You’re the one that everyone comes to for recommenda- tions when traveling. You know Rome like the back of your hand. Well, it’s never been easier to recommend places. Once you’ve added all the places you love, just point your friends or family to your Live My Journey page or automati- cally send them an organized list of your favorite places in any city through email or Facebook.

Explore New Places and Plan Trips

Live My Journey enables vistors to a place to enjoy an organ- ic local experience. Whether you’ve just traveled to Rome or Chicago, you want to experience the unique local lifestyle. We are all tourists when we travel, but we don’t want the ge- neric tourist experience. Live My Journey shows you what locals and travelers are in love with in the city you’re visiting so you can create your own memorable trip.
